node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `usergroup` ( `usergroup_id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `shortdesc` char(255) DEFAULT NULL, `doctext` mediumtext, `jointype` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `modtype` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `messageArchive` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `recommendationLink` char(32) DEFAULT NULL, `moderators` mediumtext, PRIMARY KEY (`usergroup_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci
node.title: usergroup
